discourse_list.title: New RSS feed [PR for editor review]

content.content: Editors, please help to review and approve this update to the RSS feed   github.com/ethereum/EIPs       Generating /feed.xml with all EIPs     by bmann   on 09:04PM - 12 Jan 19 UTC   12 commits   changed 8 files   with 97 additions   and 30 deletions.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is requesting editors to review and approve an update to the RSS feed. Therefore, the most fitting topics are the author asking for feedback and 3rd party auditing and reviewing the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
